mapper.select: SELECT FROM_UNIXTIME( temp.requested_at, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS `time`, SUM( IFNULL(temp.response_http_meta_contentLength,0) ) AS `size`, SUM( IFNULL(temp.chunk_length,0) ) AS `totals` FROM ( SELECT requested_at, response_http_meta_contentLength, chunk_length FROM report_provide_11 WHERE auth_dtc = #{authDtcId} ) AS temp WHERE date_sub(curdate(),INTERVAL #{days} DAY) <= date(FROM_UNIXTIME( temp.requested_at )) GROUP BY `time`
SELECT IFNULL(SUM( IFNULL( response_http_meta_contentLength, 0 ) ),0) AS `size`, IFNULL(SUM( IFNULL( chunk_length, 0 ) ),0) AS `totals` FROM report_provide_11 WHERE auth_dtc = #{authDtcId}

SELECT FROM_UNIXTIME( temp.requested_at, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS `time`, SUM( IFNULL(temp.response_http_meta_contentLength,0) ) AS `size`, SUM( IFNULL(temp.chunk_length,0) ) AS `totals` FROM report_provide_11 AS temp WHERE date_sub(curdate(),INTERVAL #{days} DAY) <= date(FROM_UNIXTIME( temp.requested_at )) GROUP BY `time`
SELECT IFNULL(SUM( IFNULL( response_http_meta_contentLength, 0 ) ),0) AS `size`, IFNULL(COUNT(1),0) AS `totals` FROM report_provide_11
